title: Add new dicing method
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: Change the dicing method to the one from Privacy Friendly Dicer

title: Tag and versionname mismatch
body: 1.1.2 has been tagged, but the gradle file still says 1.1.1 with versioncode 3. You should bump the VC, update the versionName and move the tag to the changing commit.

title: Back button
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: Back button if the dice were rolled by mistake.

title: Add additional button to remove all locks at once
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]

title: No dice should look in round 0
body: If round counter is 0 it should not be possible to lock dice.
